definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: This was just the latest in a series of delaying tactics.
sentences.chinese: 這只是一系列拖延戰術中的一個新花招。

sentences.english: Ministers are using delaying tactics to postpone the report yet again.
sentences.chinese: 部長們再次使用拖延戰術來推後報告的時間。

sentences.english: Whether the delaying tactics the Taliban and foreign troops have staying power?
sentences.chinese: 塔利班是否採取拖延戰術和外國部隊比持久力？
